column4: so apparently people in the apache channel think ubuntu is for n00bs that cant install debian. wut.
linux superiority is a waste of time, it could go on forever ubuntu < debian < arch/gentoo < bsd's < lfs < etc
yeah. honestly, as awesome as open source is, i still think WIn7 64 bit kicks some.
hmm, not completely it takes a lot of time to find and uninstall all packages to match the server edition
